itemDescription: British author, artist and scientific illustrator

wikipedia_page.main: Harriet Isabel Adams nee Baker (1863–1952) was an artist, scientific illustrator, and author based in Britain. She is most known for her botanical drawings, bookplates, and published volume of books, Wild Flower of the British Isles.

response: * Harriet Isabel Adams (1863–1952) – British artist and illustrator
*Harriet Isabel Adams (1863–1952), British artist and scientific illustrator
